app_sharing_desc: Create apps of files to share with others
app_sync_desc: Share apps via BLE or local network
app_type_desc_alerts: Receive and manage alerts and notifications. Stay informed about important updates and events in your network.
app_type_desc_backup: Securely backup your data to other devices with end-to-end encryption. Be a backup provider for others.
app_type_desc_blog: Publish articles and posts for sharing your thoughts, tutorials, or updates. Supports rich content with images and formatting.
app_type_desc_chat: Real-time messaging with support for multiple channels. Perfect for team communication or group discussions.
app_type_desc_console: Run Alpine Linux virtual machines with TinyEMU emulator. Access a full Linux terminal, mount host folders, and connect to network services.
app_type_desc_contacts: Store contact information for people and organizations. Keep your network organized and accessible.
app_type_desc_email: Decentralized email with NOSTR-based identity for cryptographic signatures. Send and receive emails through your station with end-to-end verification.
app_type_desc_events: Create and manage events with dates, times, locations, and attendee registration. Great for organizing meetups or activities.
app_type_desc_shared_folder: Store and share files in a shared folder. Create multiple shared folders for different purposes like documents, photos, or projects.
app_type_desc_forum: Discussion forum for threaded conversations and community discussions. Topics are organized by categories with support for replies and moderation.
app_type_desc_groups: Organize people into groups for easier management and communication. Create teams or interest groups.
app_type_desc_market: List items for sale, trade, or giveaway. A simple marketplace for your community.
app_type_desc_news: Share news and announcements with your network. Keep your community informed about updates and important information.
app_type_desc_places: Save and share locations with maps, coordinates, and descriptions. Document interesting places or share recommendations.
app_type_desc_postcards: Send and receive digital postcards with images and personal messages. A fun way to share memories and greetings.
app_type_desc_station: Station configuration for network communication settings. Manage how your node connects to the network.
app_type_desc_transfer: Centralized download and upload center with progress tracking, retry logic, and metrics.
app_type_desc_inventory: Track and manage your items with folder-based organization. Keep track of quantities, usage, expiry dates, and borrowed items.
app_type_desc_wallet: Track debts and payments between parties with NOSTR-signed receipts. Cryptographically verifiable records of money and time owed.
app_type_desc_log: View application logs for debugging and monitoring. Track system events, errors, and activity.
app_type_desc_www: Host a personal website with full HTML, CSS, and JavaScript support. Accessible via your station URL.

app_type_desc_tracker: Track your personal health, fitness, and activities. Record GPS paths, exercises, measurements, and more with privacy-first design.
app_type_features_tracker: GPS path recording|Exercise tracking|Health measurements|Fitness plans|Location sharing|Place check-ins|Proximity tracking
app_type_desc_videos: Share and stream videos from your device. Videos stay on your device and are streamed via WebRTC on demand, with metadata syncing to your station.
app_type_features_videos: Local video playback|WebRTC streaming|Thumbnail generation|Folder organization|Category filtering|Likes and comments
app_type_desc_work: Create and organize workspaces with NDF documents including spreadsheets, rich text documents, presentations, and forms. Sync-based collaboration with NOSTR signatures.
app_type_features_work: Spreadsheets with formulas|Rich text documents|Presentations with slides|Forms with responses|Workspace collaboration
app_type_desc_music: Local music player with folder-based album discovery. Scan your music folders, play tracks with shuffle and repeat, track listening history and statistics.
app_type_features_music: Folder-based album discovery|Cover art detection|Shuffle and repeat modes|Play queue management|Listening statistics
app_type_desc_stories: Tell your story your way. Create stunning visual experiences with tap-through scenes, touch hotspots, and cinematic auto-play. Perfect for tutorials, games, or branching adventures.
app_type_features_stories: Tap-through scene flow|Timed element appearance|Touch hotspots|Auto-advance with countdown|Hidden areas|Anchor-based positioning
app_type_desc_files: Browse and manage files on your device. View the geogram profile folder contents and navigate the filesystem. Opens documents, images, music, and videos with built-in viewers.
app_type_features_files: Profile folder browser|Device file navigation|Built-in document viewer|Image, music, and video playback|Storage location shortcuts
app_type_desc_qr: Scan and generate QR codes and barcodes. Create WiFi sharing codes, URLs, contacts, and more. Organize your codes in folders and share them as images.
app_type_features_qr: Scan QR codes and barcodes|Generate WiFi, URL, contact codes|Support for EAN, UPC, Code 128|Organize in folders|Share as images
